abstract: The agency declined to approve a medication called denosumab, meant to treat osteoporosis, until it has more data.
snippet: The agency declined to approve a medication called denosumab, meant to treat osteoporosis, until it has more data.
lead_paragraph: Amgen has failed to win approval from the Food and Drug Administration, for now at least, for the bone-strengthening drug that the company has been counting on to propel its growth.

headline.main: F.D.A. Says No to an Amgen Bone Drug
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Says No to an Amgen Bone Drug
